CHAT.comment: NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Petitioner v. KENTUCKY RIVER COMMUNITY CARE, INC., ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:40 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LAWRENCE G. WALLACE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 12:00 noon, the Court recessed, to reconvene at 1:00 p.m.)
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL W. HAWKINS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LAWRENCE G. WALLACE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 1:40 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
